name: Defy
description:
**Note : In-Case the webgl takes too long, please download the windows version...**

Trapped alone in an unknown dimension, an astronaut longing for his home goes in a journey to sneak pass alien robots and complete a mind-bending puzzle by defying the dimensional rules...

Controls :

1. A, D to move horizontally...

2. Space to Jump...

3. LMB to Hammer Smash ... (Hammer Smash is only used for breaking rules,  next attack starts only after previous finishes) 

4. R to Reload Level

Instructions :

1. You can take upto 3 damage before the level restarts... Spikes kill you instantly whereas rest everything does single damage... 

2. Green Robots : Chases once in range and then Attacks once in attack range... Have vision cones to illustrate their chase and attack range...

3. Orange Robots : Attacks as soon as you are in range... Have vision cones to illustrate their attack range...

4. Hammer Smash can only break rules and don't hurt enemies...

1. Programming and Level Designing - Vishal (https://luffy703.itch.io/)
